short_summary: Enterprise Service Desk, End User Service Desk and Enterprise Command Centre Professional Services
description: Shared Service Canada is seeking proposals for a task-based contract to provide Enterprise Service Desk, End User Service Desk and Enterprise Command Centre professional Services.
full_summary:
**Service Desk Professional Services**
=================================================

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

### Overview

Shared Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a task-based contract to provide Enterprise Service Desk, End User Service Desk, and Enterprise Command Centre professional services. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering these services across the country.

### Contract Requirements

* Enterprise Service Desk: Provide Level 1 and Level 2 technical support to employees.
* End User Service Desk: Offer technical support and assistance to employees.
* Enterprise Command Centre: Provide alerting and monitoring services.

### Contract Duration

The contract will commence on January 1, 2025, and will terminate on June 30, 2027.

### Attachment Information

Additional information and schedules related to this RFP can be found in the attachment list below. These attachments include:

* Annex A - Statement of Work (English and French)
* Attachment 2.1 - Instructions Uniformisées Concernant les Documents (Uniform Instructions for Documents)
* Attachment 3.1 - Pricing Tables (English and French)
* RFP - R000166971 Service Desk Professional Services (English and French)
* Amendment 1 - QA-EN
* Amendment 2 - QA-EN
* Amendment 3 - QA-EN
* Modification 4 - QA-FR

### Notice and Tender Information

The RFP documents can be accessed via the Canada Buys website at [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The Tender Closing Date for this RFP is July 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:
Julie Bampton
Email: [julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 790-5915

### Important Details

This RFP is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

Please note that this RFP is open to all interested bidders, and only English and French language documents will be accepted. Bidders are expected to comply with all relevant regulations and guidelines.

### Tender Status

This RFP is open and actively seeks interested bidders. The Tender Closing Date is the deadline for submitting a bid. Please review the RFP documents for the complete requirements and guidelines.

Attachments
